name: jsrevival
description: A multi process javascript lib and cli linter using JSLint

scripts.posttest: node bin/jsrevival -r cli-hide-valid -o "properties:false,maxlen:0,debug:false,vars:false,passfail:false,unparam:false" -p "describe,it" -R example/ lib/ test/jsrevival_lib.js test/jsrevival_bin.js
